title: Can I change back to the android 9 Two-Button on my pixel 3 that is on android 10?
content:
Hi all,
I updated to android 10 a while ago and I really miss a part of the Android 9 two-button navigation system.
You used to be able to swipe from left to right on the pill and hold to one side to go through all of your open apps.
Since the update you can now only multitask between the last 2 opened apps by swiping, and holding across the navigation bar no longer lets you multitask like before.

I really liked this feature, Is there a way to enable it or something?

Pixel 3 btw

Thanks.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
